title: Foxworth Monday: Joe Burrow Stagnates, Questioning Tom Brady, Trey Lance Injured
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth share their thoughts on the NFL action from over the weekend, including who is to blame for the slow start in Denver (15:23), if Bengals QB Joe Burrow has improved since last season (23:53), when it will be time to start questioning Buccaneers QB Tom Brady (27:25), if losing QB Trey Lance means a lost season for the 49ers (39:54) and much more!
